name: The High Haven House B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, we have to say our stay at the High Haven B&B was far from ideal. We are a very well traveled couple who work in the airline business and although not having much experiences with B&B, we have to say it was really disappointing. We also understand the Vineyards are more expensive than mainland in general, but comparing prices can still tell a lot.
reviews.title: You get what you paid for... well, not really!

reviews.text: Let me start by saying, while my stay rates "poor" this place does have potential. Danny - one of two brothers that own the place - seems to care. They other brother, not so much. And it shows.
reviews.title: Wish we'd stayed elsewhere.

reviews.text: We arrived and Chris, the other brother, was handling check-in. He honestly did not even bother to greet us. He wordlessly walked us to our door and handed me a key. He started to walk away before I stopped him to ask for some basic info, like when and where breakfast would be. He gave us the most minimal reply before walking off.
reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!

reviews.text: This is a budget place. This also shows. Do not expect the typical things you may have experienced with other B&B's. Even then, I was really disappointed and didn't feel it was worth the price we paid - even if it is a bargain for the island.
reviews.title: Convienient location - clean room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our rooms were clean and the beds were fine, but the bathroom is in need of update/repair and smelled of mildew. We had the suite with a kitchen, which had dishes in the sink and items left in the fridge from the last guests. Not sure what other rooms might be like, but ours lacked any sort of charm or warmth. Except for one photo in the common area, there were no pictures on the walls.
reviews.title: A less expensive accommodation alternative

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is not necessarily near town, but could be considered walking distance if 10-15 minutes is walking distance to you. The property is located in a residential area that was quiet and safe.
reviews.title: Think before you stay

description: The High Haven House B&B just went through some recent renovations while under new management. We are located 800 meters North East to downtown Vineyard haven in a quiet residential neighborhood. We have a variety of economic choices, as our family run business strives to provide a comfortable stay with a resonable price. Because we try to keep the prices down for guests, we offer a simple continental breakfast. At least two of our rooms have shared baths, so make sure you check the room details thoroughly when booking. During the warmer weather, enjoy our outdoor pool. For rainy days, all rooms now have flat screen LCD TVs and cable.
